txt.en: The Beorning Ragnild is concerned about the threat posed by the wargs of Duskenvale.
Free captive sheep from the wargs ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

'There is something very peculiar about the wargs of Duskenvale, [placeholder]. They feed upon whatever animals they can seize in their powerful jaws, but it seems that sometimes they save their prey for later. They drag their victims back to their dens, and when their appetite returns, their meal is ready and waiting to be devoured!\n\n'Many sheep once grazed in Duskenvale, cared for and tended to by my kin. But the wargs have made this a dangerous task! If you can rescue sheep from the wargs, I would greatly appreciate it. Let us show these wargs that we mean to protect our animals!'
Some sheep have been captured by the wargs of Duskenvale. If you can free the captive sheep, you will have deprived the wargs of a future meal.
Ragnild, representing the Beorning's stake in the Vales of Anduin, is concerned about the grazing sheep, who have all but disappeared from the Duskenvale.
